description.desc1: This node allows to get info about a transformation hierarchy.

RenderGroup.descript: set the render group. Capture/Beamer/3DViewer have an equivalent in which you can choose which group to render.

draw position.descript: draws the position of the node

draw rotation.descript: draws the rotation of the node

draw parent link.descript: draws the link to the parent node
